website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech ChillStream's cooling fan may not be very useful, but the controller is still superbly designed and will grow more useful as more Games for Windows titles are released in 2007 and beyond.
pros: The Logitech ChillStream is a well-designed, comfortable, Vista-ready gaming controller with an internal fan that vents air on the player's palms
cons: Whether or not sweaty palms are enough of a problem to require fan cooling is debatable
There's no wireless option for now
To date, not all PC games are compatible with the ChillStream, and we wish it worked for the Xbox 360, since it shares the system's controller design

customer_reviews.title: Good solid feel and fans work at two speeds or off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before I realized that all 360 gamepads work with windows games. Yeah, I know. Anyway, this is my primary gamepad for use with a pc. It works great with any new or reasonably new game that supports gamepads. Older games, as with any 360 controller, may need remapping programs. I don't really use the cooling fan, but it has two settings and works great. Overall, has a good solid feel and is responsive. I've never had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: not programmable
customer_reviews.text: this thing is not programmable. the logitech profiler software does not recognize it and will not profile for it, which suxxors. on the other hand, it's super comfortable as well as very cool since it has the fan. the fan is nice because it keeps my hands cool all the time. i've been using it for emulators and Lego Starwars to great effect.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first when I bought this. Let's face it the fan is just a bonus but I didn't want it to ruin the controller it self. But both the fan and controller are great! the fan gives a nice cool flow of air and the controller itself works great. The buttons themselves are good. One of the buttons did get stuck temporarily when I was bashing it a lot (and i mean a LOT). But it was easily remedied when I just pressed it slow and nudged it. I recommend this product highly because it does the job it is supposed to and gives you a little more (the fan) for free!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Djugash

customer_reviews.title: I'd go back to my RumblePad
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a new model to replace RumblePad, but it's not. I have no use for the chilling fan, which is quite noisy if turned on (and it will turn itself on every time my computer returns from hibernation). It does not have vibration. It is not supported by Logitech Gaming Software, but you can download the free & powerful Xpadder for button configuration.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The cooling fan feature is not really for me but this is a very serviceable gamepad. I have an XBOX 360 and this is a decent imitation of that system's controller. It's much lighter and smaller, so it feels cheaper/shoddier in general than the XBOX 360 controller, but the button layout and dual analogs are close enough to trick my thumbs into thinking I'm using my XBOX. I've only used this to play NBA2K12 on my PC.

customer_reviews.title: Great controller for EA Sports Madden
customer_reviews.text: This controller is by far the best by Logitech. After tryng several logitech and a Saitek controller, the Chillstream is by far the best I have had it for a month and had no problems. Logitechs Xbox 360 setup works great. Madden 08 works great with it. Its like they created the controller for EA sports games like Madden. Instead of having numbers like with other controllers for receivers you a blue X, yellow Y, Red B, and green A. The cooler works great as it keeps your hands comfortable. GREAT GAMEPAD!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Controller!
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech ChillStream Gamepad for PC is a very excellent gamepad controller. It is designed to look, and function, like an X-Box or X-Box 360 controller for one's PC. It also features two (2) fans in each hand grip to help with the sweat palm issue one incurs while playing video games for hours on end. There are two (2) speeds for these fans, which is nice.
